Package org.apache.openjpa.persistence

Interface Extent<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtentImpl
public interface Extent<T> extends Iterable<T>
An extent is a logical view of all instances of a class.
Since:
0.4.0
Author:
Abe White
